ingredients.ingredient: 1 large zucchini, thinly sliced into rounds
1 teaspoon kosher salt, or to taste

cookingTips: Slice zucchini as thinly and uniformly as possible for even cooking
Pat slices very dry with paper towels to promote crisping and reduce sogginess
Bake at 375Â°F for 20-25 minutes, stirring halfway through for even browning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the baker on achieving crispy vegetable chips through proper moisture removal, thin slicing, and temperature management.
